tool.name: Spatial Analysis Tools

param.name: anndata
param.label: Select the input anndata

param.name: selected_tool
param.label: Select an analysis
param.option: Spatial Aggregate -- find regions of aggregration of similar cells
Spatial Count -- compute a neighbourhood matrix using any categorical variables (e.g. cell-types)
Spatial Distance -- calculate the average shortest between phenotypes or clusters of interest
Spatial Expression -- o compute a neighbourhood weighted matrix based on the expression values
Spatial Interaction -- computes how likely celltypes are found next to each another compared to random background
Spatial LDA -- compute a neighbourhood matrix using any categorical variable and then perform Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) modelling
Spatial pscore -- a scoring system to evaluate user defined proximity between cell types

param.name: method
param.label: Select the clustering method
Type in a list of genes that should be included for the purpose of clustering
param.help: Optional. Comma delimited. By default the algorithm uses all genes in the dataset.

param.label: Whether to do sub-clustering on existing clustering or phenotyping

param.help: This is only required when sub_cluster is set to True.

param.label: Type in a list of group names within the sub-cluster column
param.help: Optional. Comma delimited. By default the program will sub-cluster all groups within column passed through the argument sub_cluster_column.

param.label: A parameter value controlling the coarseness of the clustering
param.help: Higher values lead to more clusters.

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool does single cell phenotyping via either manual gating or auto gating (gaussian mixture modeling) using Scimap.
**Input**
AnnData.
**Output**
Anndata with "obs/phenotype" added.
